cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid_level' will cause log configuration parsing errors and prevent proper logging initialization in the CU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the MTU value to a string 'invalid' instead of an integer will cause type mismatch errors during FHI configuration parsing in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 MTU 值設定為字串 'invalid' 而非整數會導致 DU 中 FHI 配置解析期間的類型不匹配錯誤。
